content: the eyes on row 10 cheeks between row 11 and 12 you can also add other facial features if you want with a black thread and a tapestry needle go through the entire body from side to side on row 10 make a knot on each side to make the hands do the same for the legs at any position from the bottom note if you want to fasten the arms and legs better you should probably add them and fasten tightly before filling the junimo good luck /tollow
